body:
Hey guys, recently I was banned on Avicus (stupid me). So, I thought that it would be a good time for me to leave.

Thank you everyone for the great memories I've had on Avicus and TeamSpeak, I'll never forget those times.

Thankyou Avicus <3

Sign this petition to get me unbanned! https://www.change.org/p/people-unban-harry

replies.body:
Well Harry, it was really nice being a staff member with you.
Me and you have definitely been through a lot together, going to miss seeing you around.

Thanks for being a good friend to me, contact me on Skype if you ever need anything okay?

You can always appeal as well, remember that.

replies.body: Well, you know that you did a big mistake. People make mistakes. I've never used a hack client, but I can understand what you feel. But you know, it's not allowed. My opinion is making your ban shorten. I mean like 2 months. Cuz hacking should cost something =/
replies.body_tagged: Well, you know that you did a big mistake. People make mistakes. I've never used a hack client, but I can understand what you feel. But you know, it's not allowed. My opinion is making your ban shorten. I mean like 2 months. Cuz hacking should cost something =/

replies.body: Seeya man! Please please please appeal 6 months from now, since that's around the amount of time you have to wait to get an accepted appeal for hacking. I'd love to have you stay. :)
replies.body_tagged: Seeya man! Please please please appeal 6 months from now, since that's around the amount of time you have to wait to get an accepted appeal for hacking. I'd love to have you stay. :)
